message:
Great post. It was the basis of some research I was tasked (pun) at work. For QBWI, based on this link, ASP.NET will wait up to 90 seconds. But even that was misleading.  
[https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/webdev/2014/06/04/queuebackgroundworkitem-to-reliably-schedule-and-run-background-processes-in-asp-net/](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/webdev/2014/06/04/queuebackgroundworkitem-to-reliably-schedule-and-run-background-processes-in-asp-net/)
